summary: This mod adds a Thieves Guild base under solitude.
descriptionHtml:
Currently abandoned. I might continue work if i ever get better at modding.

This mod adds a Thieves Guild base under solitude. It can be accessed from either behind the house next to the winking skeever in Solitude or a mine shaft under the Solitude arch and a bit north on the wall. You enter into a cave system and after a quick (<30 seconds) walk you find your self in an abandoned underground prison. Inside you can find a barkeep, a drunk, a few thieves... My first mod, will be updated. Anyone wanting to help in the updating of this mod is welcome!
On steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=234596584
Nexus: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51748/?
Things to be added (Would love help):
Quest to find/refurb base
fix the Fence
add cool things
fix holes in walls
author: OODintheROOM
